title: Pbe
body: Hello , I have been playing league since season 3 , I applied for pbe but no reply yet . Checked my email and nothing there ! Does that means I am not accepted ?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you aren't guaranteed PBE Access simply by applying for it. There is specific criteria that our teams look for in testers when they send out invites, but this criteria changes all the time, depending on what we're testing at the moment. Criteria that remains consistent is that we look for positive players that are really active in League and would give great feedback. Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
am i close to being able to be invited (winky face)
I'm not sure, since we cannot manually review PBE applications. I wish you the best of luck with your application, though. ^.^
